attributes.action: Remove the European Flag at London City Hall once Article 50 has been submitted
attributes.background: As Britain is now an independent country and making our own way in the world we should remove the European flag outside London's City Hall. I feel as if this was put up prematurely and irrationally by our London Mayor as this flag will no longer represent Great Britain for the foreseeable future.

rejection.details: This petition appears to be addressed to the Mayor of London. The UK Government and Parliament Petitions website can only be used for petitions which are addressed to central government or Parliament.
